作为一款解谜游戏，Portal 系列并不是难度最高的
但若是加上曲折反复的剧情和如此深邃复杂的科幻构图以及引人思考的世界观
它就是独一档的存在
通关后我没有很强的成就感，反而会感到怅然若失
我多么希望我被扔下的管道是10000米深
那样说不定就会有更多关卡了~

提个小细节
游戏刚开始你会在垃圾管道里看到一个给你打招呼的Turret
她对你说了一句“I’m different.”
很开心，我在后面的粉碎机传送带又碰到了她
在救了她之后，她会说“Thank you.”
然后她语音的下一句话是
“普罗米修斯为了把知识送给人类，而受到了上帝的惩罚，他被投入深沟，任鸟儿啄食。”
喔......
我想一直带着她，可万恶的G胖在下一个拐角就放了一道凋亡门
她消失的那一刻，我确实有点小难受

总而言之一句话
经典永流传，V社不数三
这是一款注定被铭记的作品！
very emersive and fun w/ others

As a clear improvement from its predecessor, Portal 2 is packed to the brim with all of the best qualities a game could offer. In terms of gameplay mechanics, it completely innovates the familiar puzzle game-gimmick and adds a twist to it; as the title of the game suggests, we're dealing with portals. The puzzle themselves are intricate and complex, but never too difficult to master, and as the game progresses, you're introduced to new core elements which not only raise the difficulty, but also makes testing so much more entertaining. This results in each and every level consistently leaving you with a feeling of adequacy. Of course, Portal 2 wouldn't have been this renowned hadn't it been for the incredible storytelling it offers, which greatly expands upon the lore from the first game. New characters, a deeper plot, and stunning visuals - this game has got it all. Top it all off with a great soundtrack, and genuine witty humor that has aged like wine. 
Furthermore, Portal 2 brings to us a new gaming experience to the franchise, namely the two-person co-op mode, which could be considered a little extra story on its own, and is a great way to introduce others to the world of Portal. There is much more to be said about the game, but I truly suggest that you experience it all on your own.
Even when considering the fact that the game is fairly small, as it's only about 6-8 hours long, the magnificence of Portal 2 seems to never wear off, and one would find themselves constantly coming back in order to experience the game, once again.
its a very fun game for everyones age
its portal 2, its a really good game.
I have 100+ hours in this game and have never gotten bored playing it with the story, Co-Op, and community maps this is one of the best games I have ever played

It's been 9 years since I played this game, and I truly don't think I appreciated what I had. I recently replayed the Portal series, cause why not, and I was blown away by just how the well the graphics and gameplay hold up 9 years later. Portal 2 could be released as is tomorrow, and I'd probably still say that this game is worth buying. I truly don't know why Valve didn't support or push for a Portal 3.

Although, you probably know this, because Portal was the innovator in puzzle platform games, back when Valve was the top name in games. I've rediscovered the map editor and online communities brilliance in puzzle design. I just hope the online community is still active enough for me to enjoy what I took for granted so so long ago.
